# sluga

> Slugify string

## Installation

```bash
npm install --save sluga
```

## Usage

```js
var sluga = require('sluga');

console.log(sluga(' ////  @!!! Make me a slug, you ÓŁĄŻŹŃąśżźćęółń! -----///  ----'));
// -> make-me-a-slug-you-olazznaszzceoln
```

Other exported stuff: chars
